columns.name: state
columns.description: Current state of the provisioning service.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The ARM provisioning state of the provisioning service.

columns.name: allocation_policy
columns.description: Allocation policy to be used by this provisioning service.

columns.name: device_provisioning_host_name
columns.description: Device endpoint for this provisioning service.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: id_scope
columns.description: Unique identifier of this provisioning service..

columns.name: authorization_policies
columns.description: List of authorization keys for a provisioning service.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the iot dps.

columns.name: iot_hubs
columns.description: List of IoT hubs associated with this provisioning service.
